title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Upper Shelf, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard with Upper Shelf
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
dimensions: 21.3 x 27.6 cm (8 3/8 x 10 7/8 in. )(at widest points; lower corners cut off)
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Sideboard with six straight tapering legs; rounded front corners with patera medallion decoration at center of each; flat front middle section: four drawers in three rows; upperwardly extended back and two short columns support upper shelf.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Upper Shelf, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-26
